utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on, no peeking!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Our eyes are closed and we’re about to cross the street. Very good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okayyyyy, open up!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What did you want to show us? Because all I can see is this bitchin' van!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, it’s for our catering business!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I think I know that girl.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, umm, we’re not gonna really keep it this way though.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, we’re gonna paint over the sword, and replace it with a baguette.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And also, we don’t know what to do with this.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah, I definitely know her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Remember that guy from cooking school I told you about that put cilantro with everything?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh sure, Cilantro Larry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I’m gonna fill in for him as food critic for the Chelsea Reporter.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow, Monica! What an amazing opportunity to influence… dozens of people.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How could you say yes, what about our catering business?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no, it’s only one night a week, and plus I get to take all of you out for a lot of free dinners.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yay!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, in that case——Yay! That was me hopping on board.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, you guys! Hey, Ross, quick question for ya. Are you ready to party?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t know, I could maybe go out for a couple of beers, but there’s this thing about bumblebees on The Discovery Channel that I was planning to watch.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no, I don’t think you heard me. Are you ready to party?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nooo!! Gandolf?! Gandolf is coming to town?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Kathy’s with her parents, I have nothing to do, so tomorrow we are partying with Gandolf dude!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude, we are sooo gonna party!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow! Okay, dude alert! And who is this guy?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mike "Gandolf" Ganderson, only like the funest guy in the world.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m gonna call and get off work tomorrow!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m gonna call after you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is gonna be soo cool, dude, we never party anymore!

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Ross
utterance.content: Woooo!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, were you guys smoking something in the back of our van?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really. And what do you mean you never have fun anymore? You have fun with me, remember that time we saw those strippers and you paid me 50 bucks to eat that book?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, you are gonna love this guy. Gandolf is like the party wizard!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, why do you call him Gandolf?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Gandolf the wizard. Hello! Didn’t you read Lord of the Rings in high school?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I had sex in high school.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, uh, Joanna I was wondering if I could ask you something. There’s an opening for an assistant buyer in Junior Miss…

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Okay, but that would actually be a big step down for me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, actually, I meant for me. The hiring committee is meeting people all day and…

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Oh. Well, I wish I could say no, but you can’t stay my assistant forever. Neither can you Sophie, but for different reasons.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: God, I am so glad you don’t have a problem with this, because if you did, I wouldn’t even consider applying.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Really? Well, in that case…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And that’s I’m so glad… there’s no problem.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: That’s fine, actually I’m on the hiring committee, so there’ll be at least one friendly face.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! That’s great!

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: You know, Junior Miss is where I started. Oh, I had to sleep with the ugliest guy to get that job.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: No-ho-ho! Yeah. I mean, no-no-no-no-no, don’t you worry, I’m sure with your qualifications you won’t need to sleep with some guy to get that job. Although, I might need some convincing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I, umm…

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Kidding! God, I feel wild today!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh man! I am so excited—I may vomit!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Will you calm down, he’s just a human guy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look you don’t understand, Gandolf is amazing. Y’know you’re never know what’s gonna end up happening, you go out for a couple of beers and end up on a fishing boat to Nova Scotia!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, it’s beautiful country up there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Okay! I got my passport, fresh socks, and a snake bite kit!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It’s not gonna be exactly like last time.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, I’ll see you guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Ross
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa-whoa!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Whoa-wh-wh-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I have an audition, but I’ll definitely hook up with you later. Where are you gonna be around noon?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Somewhere maybe along the equator?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello. It’s Gandolf!!! So, are you in town? Oh, well, well maybe next time then.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He’s not gonna make it, he’s stuck in Chicago.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, man! Chicago, is sooo lucky!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Stupid, useless Canadian money!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Posner
utterance.content: You have a very impressive resume, Ms. Green. I especially like what I see here about implementing a new filing system.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Filing system? Oh-oh! You mean those-those little colored labels you put on all the folders? It certainly did brighten up the inside of the filing cabinets.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, they uh, they-they do more than that.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Lynch
utterance.content: I notice that you’ve been trusted with a lot of rather important responsibilities.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, Joanna really has been an incredible mentor to me.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Oh. And Rachel has been really incredible in getting my morning bagel for me. It’s amazing how she gets it right almost every time!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I-I-I of course, I have more responsibilities than that.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Oh yes, well there’s the coffee too. Rachel can carry two things at once!

utterance.speaker: Mr. Posner
utterance.content: Yes, that’s very good. Now a uh, big part of this job is cultivating personal relationships, especially with designers.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, I realize that…

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: And Rachel shouldn’t have any problem with that. The only problem might be getting a little too friendly, if you know what I mean.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I love working with designers!

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: With them, under them, what’s the difference? Eh, Rach?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! My first review is out!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh! Oh, the Chelsea Reporter, ohh, this used to keep me so warm.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, look at my on the back page.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay! "Would I go back to Allesandro’s? Sure, but I’d have to order two meals, one for me and one for the guy pointing the gun to my head." Wow! You really laid into this place.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, they don’t pay me a penny a word to make friends.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, I gotta go. I found a guy that who could fix up the van for catering.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh! Do you need me to go with you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No-no, it’s okay. But are we sure we don’t want the waterbed?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Haven’t we made this decision?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, all right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who is it?

utterance.speaker: Allesandro
utterance.content: It’s Allesandro, from Allesandro’s.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Allesandro
utterance.content: I want to talk to you about your review.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, oh my God. Call me on the phone!

utterance.speaker: Allesandro
utterance.content: Why? So you could hang up on me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look, I-I’m never gonna let you up so you may as well just go away.

utterance.speaker: Allesandro
utterance.content: Just give me a chance too…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, do you need to get in? Here you go.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, Monica!

utterance.speaker: Allesandro
utterance.content: I want a retraction! Our food is not inedible swill!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I couldn’t eat it! I had five friends who couldn’t eat it, and one of them eats books.

utterance.speaker: Allesandro
utterance.content: Well our service is not grossly incompetent.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The waiter carried the breadsticks in his pants!

utterance.speaker: Allesandro
utterance.content: Well, you said that we except the Discover Card, which we do not!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, that I’ll retract. But I stand by my review, I know food and that wasn’t it. You’re marinara sauce tasted like tomato juice! You should serve it with vodka and a piece of celery.

utterance.speaker: Allesandro
utterance.content: Hey! I’m proud of that sauce, it’s delicious.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! You own an Italian restaurant and you think that tastes good?! Where are you even from?

utterance.speaker: Allesandro
utterance.content: Lebanon.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hand me those tomatoes, I’m gonna show you what it should taste like! Come on, hand me them.

utterance.speaker: Allesandro
utterance.content: How long is this gonna take? ‘Cause I got another critic to go yell at.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm, Joanna? I wanna talk about that interview.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: I thought it went very well.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! It didn’t! That’s what I want to talk to you about. Now, just to brief you… I may cry, but they are not tears of sadness or of anger, but just of me having this discussion with you.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Rachel, please, don’t make a scene.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: There’s nobody here!

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Sophie, get in here! You see! Now you’re making Sophie uncomfortable!

utterance.speaker: Sophie
utterance.content: She’s not making me uncomfortable.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Congratulations! You now just crossed the line into completely useless. Get out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you want me to quit?

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: What?! What would make you think that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well of those things that you said in the interview, I mean if you believe any of them, I must not be a very good assistant. Y’know what? I am just gonna pack up my desk, and I will be gone by the end of the day! Well, I guess there’s no use to me sticking around ‘til the end of the day!

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Wait-wait-wait-wait! You can put your sad little muffin back in it’s drawer. If you must know the truth, I didn’t want to lose a perfectly good assistant.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: That’s why I said all those things about your flirting and your drinking…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: My drinking?

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Oh, I must’ve said that after you left.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Said what? Exactly.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: That you enjoyed the occasional drink…ing binge.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!! Ohh, that is it! I’m leaving! You are just a horrible person!

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Wait-wait-wait-wait-wait-wait-wait-wait!! If you’re gonna get all sensitive about it! I don’t want to lose you. What if I, create a position for you? I’ll make you an assistant buyer in this department.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Say more things like that.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: You can have your own office, and a raise! Effective tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’d need an expense account.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Done!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And an assistant.

utterance.speaker: Joanna
utterance.content: Sophie, get in here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! What are you guys doing here? I thought you’d be out partying with Gandel-worf.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s Gandolf, and he’s not coming.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So you’ve been sittin’ around here all mornin’?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! I balanced my checkbook.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, and I-I gave first names to all of the foosball players.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can’t believe he didn’t come!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So what if he didn’t come! We can still go out and party ourselves!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh-no, y’know with Gandolf we’d be out all night!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! We’d meet, we’d meet total strangers, and hang out with them!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, we could do that!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There’s other stuff too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We’ll do it all, and better! Look, after tonight, Gandolf will want to party with us, dude! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s not like we don’t know how to party!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! All right? Let’s go!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And may-maybe we could end up on a boat again?

utterance.speaker: Joey and Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey-hey-hey, when uh, when were we on a boat?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Remember that really cold morning, you woke up and those dogs were licking your face?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, those were seals, man.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Mon, little question for ya! How do you think this suit will look on an assistant buyer?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, the owner of Allesandro’s came over to yell at me, but instead I made him some sauce, and he offered me the job as head chef!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!! You just ruined the thing I was practicing the whole way home, but I’m soo happy!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Can you believe it? I finally get to run my own kitchen!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, you’ve waited soo long.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, Pheebs, quick question for ya.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How do you think this suit would look on an assistant buyer at Bloomingdale’s?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t know, it would totally depend on her coloring and… You got the job!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You got the job?! Why didn’t you tell me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, it’s gonna be so great! I’m gonna get to help decide what we sell, I’m gonna have an office with walls and everything. I’m gonna have walls!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, is this the day of good news or what? I got us a job! The wedding reception.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh! Umm, Phoebe, I kinda need to talk to you about that. Umm, well I-I-I think it might be time for me to take a step back from catering.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But we’ve only had one job.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know, but now we have this second one and it just, it feels like it’s snowballing, y’know?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! What are you saying?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I got offered the head chef job at Allesandro’s.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s okay, ‘cause y'know what? You don’t really need me for the business.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’re the cook! With out you it’s just me driving up to people’s houses with empty trays and asking for money!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right. But umm, I-I-I’ll pay you back all the money you invested, and you can keep the van.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: For what? I can’t believe this! I gotta get out of here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, wait a minute!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m an assistant buyer!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, so we’ll get a little coffee, and get energized, and we’ll head back out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, all right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, we’re having fun, right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We don’t need that wizard guy. We hit a couple of clubs, talked to some strangers, and uh, after this, we’ll head down to the docks and see about that boat thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m kinda beat.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Actually, me too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you serious?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank God! I’m exhausted!

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: So you guys want coffees?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, but uh, I don’t want to be up too late, so uh, I’ll have a decaf.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, me too.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Actually, can I get some hot water with a little lemon? I think I strained my voice screaming in there. Does it have to be so loud?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can’t hear a word you’re saying, my ears are ringing so bad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m just glad I brought that extra pair of socks, y’know? I used them as mittens, I didn’t want to touch a thing in that last place.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How sad are we?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I know.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know what? We’re not sad, we’re not sad, we’re just not 21 anymore. Y’know? I’m 29 years old, damnit! And I want to sit in a comfortable chair, and watch television and go to bed at a reasonable hour!

utterance.speaker: Joey and Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! And I like to hang out in a quiet place where I can talk to my friends.

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And so what if I like to go home, throw on some Kenny G, and take a bath!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We’re 29, we’re not women.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh, here you are. Y’know, I’m-I’m glad you decided to hear me out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, I’m hearing.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’ve been doing a lot of thinking. A lot! And umm, well, I came up with a whole bunch of businesses you can do with your van. Okay umm, you could be flower delivery person.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Or! A bakery delivery person.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I wa-I wa-I wa…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Pizza?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, I’ve got a whole bunch of uh-uh, stuff in this area, but umm, I’m getting the feeling that you don’t want to deliver.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. I’m guessing that if you don’t want to deliver, you probably don’t want to pick stuff up either.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know what, let’s do the catering business.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?! Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, y'know I-I made a commitment to you. Y’know what, it’d be, it’d be fun.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! It will be fun! Ohh! Yay! Oh! Okay, ooh, let’s plan the wedding reception. Wow! You really wanted me to do something with this van. Y’know what, I want you to take the chef job.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. That’s what you really want. Yeah, I don’t want to be the reason you’re unhappy, that would just make me unhappy, and I really don’t want to be the reason I’m unhappy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Besides, it might be kinda fun to form the new A-Team.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hi Mrs. Lynch! Is Joanna in already?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Lynch
utterance.content: Oh my goodness! You haven’t heard!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Heard what?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Lynch
utterance.content: Joanna passed away last night.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! How?!

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Lynch
utterance.content: Well, she was leaving work and she was hit by a cab.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! Oh, I cannot believe it!

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Lynch
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, God. Oh, God. Oh God.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Lynch
utterance.content: I didn’t realize that she was so close.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, so close. Mrs. Lynch, I know that this is an emotional and difficult time, for all of us. But by any chance did Joanna send any paperwork your way before… it happened.

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Lynch
utterance.content: No. Nothing. Imagine, if she had just stepped off that curb a few seconds later.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes-yes, just a few seconds and she’d still be with us—nothing about an assistant buyer?

utterance.speaker: Mrs. Lynch
utterance.content: No, I’m sorry. I have to go.

utterance.speaker: Sophie
utterance.content: Good morning!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Sophie, I guess you didn’t hear about Joanna…

utterance.speaker: Sophie
utterance.content: I sure did!

utterance.speaker: Allesandro
utterance.content: I’m so excited about having Monica come on board with us. Although I do feel bad about having fired chef Emillio, it’s like losing a member of the family. Of course, that literally is the case for several of you. Tony, Carlos, Marie, please, tell your father how much we’re gonna miss him. Now, I know that Monica has a lot of great ideas for this place, well, you all read the review. So without much further ado, I present to you our new head chef.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Umm, I just wanna say, uh that with a pinch of exictement, a dash of hard work, a dollup of cooperation, we can have the recipe... Are you gonna kill me?
